title: WELCOME HOME! GREAT LOCATION, AMAZING AMENITIES WITH HEATED POOL
posting_body: ['Welcome to Chorus', "Chorus is prominently and conveniently located at the cross point of SF's most dynamic neighborhoods.", 'The private residences are complete with the latest technology and top-of-the-line appliances.', 'Outside the home, Chorus residents enjoy access to a unique collection of amenities including a rooftop pool, outdoor American Ninja Warrior course, solarium, speakeasy and lobby cocktail bar.', 'The community is expertly maintained 24 hours a day by a dedicated team with attention to every detail.', 'Join the Chorus family today!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Adjacent Chorus Hall 227-seat performing arts venue', 'Indoor/outdoor fitness lab with functional training equipment and 10 rotating classes per week', 'Attended arrival desk', 'Skybox lounge', 'Backyard terrace with pizza oven', 'Saltwater pool with private cabanas, lounge areas and Jacuzzi', 'Co-working space with private conference rooms', 'Valet parking', 'Ninja Warrior course with an 8-foot warped wall and octagon frame', 'Dog run, grooming station and pet wash', 'EV & scooter charging stations', 'Rooftop solarium with floating fireplace, private dining kitchen and skyline views', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Check out the virtual tour:', '<URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
